resources.string: Please read our Terms & Policies \n Click "Agree and continue" if you accept
By Clicking on Continue you confirm to agree with Brilliant Connect Terms & Policies
Please confirm your country / region and enter your phone number
If did not receive OTP, Please contact support using below link: https://app.brilliant.com.bd/otp
Brilliant connect is a voice calling app that you can use to make calls to any mobile and land phone number. App to app calls and messaging are free
Brilliant Connects\' crystal clear voice quality while making or receiving calls to/from anywhere around the globe enables you to stay close to your loved ones no matter where you are
Install this app and get a unique Brilliant Connect number. This number enables you to receive calls from any mobile/landline number from anywhere in the world
Brilliant Connect gives you the freedom to call any mobile or landline number in Bangladesh anytime at the lowest call rate
Brilliant connect is a voice calling app that you can use to make calls to any mobile and land phone number. App to app calls and messaging are free.
Allow Brilliant to send you notifications?
Need contacts read permission for fetching and displaying contacts
